article_title: Obamacare, Improving Economy Fuel Faster U.S. Health Spending

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Health spending, which slowed last year to growth of  3.6 percent, will roar to 6 percent growth annually for the next decade thanks to the ability of more Americans to buy medical services from an improving economy and the Affordable Care Act. A new report from actuaries of the Centers for [...]
